name: content_capabilities
schema:
CREATE TABLE `content_capabilities` (
	`content_id` text NOT NULL,
	`capability_id` text NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY(`content_id`, `capability_id`),
	FOREIGN KEY (`content_id`) REFERENCES `content`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade,
	FOREIGN KEY (`capability_id`) REFERENCES `capabilities`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade
)
